plot: Chris, a licentious exotic dancer, and her roommate, Cathy, plot to get Chris' boyfriend to notice her by making him jealous, while Cal's handyman has other plans for the two women.
title: Shameless Desire
plot_es: Chris, a licentious exotic dancer, and her roommate, Cathy, plot to get Chris' boyfriend to notice her by making him jealous, while Cal's handyman has other plans for the two women.
plot_en: Chris, a licentious exotic dancer, and her roommate, Cathy, plot to get Chris' boyfriend to notice her by making him jealous, while Cal's handyman has other plans for the two women.
